title: Bikewatching Interactive Data Visualization
description: This project created an interactive geospatial visualization of Bluebikes traffic in Boston/Cambridge using Mapbox GL JS for the basemap and D3.js for custom overlays, integrating bike lane data and over 260,000 trip records. I used a D3 Square Root Scale to accurately size station markers based on total traffic volume and implemented a reactive time slider for temporal data filtering, allowing users to analyze traffic flow (arrivals vs. departures) across different times of day. This required synchronizing D3's SVG markers with Mapbox's pan and zoom events, demonstrating a full-stack data visualization pipeline.

title: Legend of Legends Position Prediction
description: League of Legends Position Analysis is a data science project conducted in UC San Diego's Halıcıoğlu Data Science Institute's class, DSC80. This project utilizes skills in exploratory data analysis, hypothesis testing, baseline modeling, and fairness analysis. Overall, our objective is to analyze the League of Legends' positions and predict the positions based on the 2025 League of Legends competitive matches data.

title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis of College Students
description: Analyzed student sentiment on social media by preprocessing 1.6M tweets and isolating 195 college-related posts to engineer meaningful features for predictive modeling. Built and validated models using t-tests and hypothesis testing in SciPy, uncovering a 25% spike in negative sentiment during finals week with statistical significance. Developed interactive Plotly visualizations and Pandas summary statistics to clearly communicate sentiment trends, providing actionable insights while coordinating a team to maintain a consistent and efficient data pipeline.

title: SkyCha Product Launch Plan
description: Led the development of a product launch plan for SkyChaa, conducting comprehensive competitor and market analyses to identify opportunities and gaps. Performed customer segmentation and target market profiling to tailor marketing strategies, and developed actionable recommendations to optimize product positioning, adoption, and overall launch success.

title: Spotify AI Personalization Market Analysis
description: Mentored a team of 5 to conduct in-depth market research on Spotify’s AI personalization, analyzing user experience and competitor features. Synthesized findings into 3 actionable recommendations—enhancing AI modeling, improving customer interactions, and boosting visibility through media—and presented insights to 100+ students, coaching the team on research, analysis, and presentation skills throughout the process.

title: Clarins AI Bot Market Analysis
description: Conducted SWOT and competitor analyses on Clarins’ AI bot to identify opportunities for enhancing user experience and market positioning. Designed and analyzed a detailed survey with 20+ data points, generating data-driven insights visualized in Google Sheets. Delivered strategic recommendations to 100+ peers through a client-style presentation, translating complex research into actionable steps that informed product strategy and strengthened team collaboration.

title: San Diego MTS Predictive Modeling
description: Developed predictive models for San Diego’s MTS system to forecast bus wait times using historical data, improving insights into service efficiency. Created comprehensive visualizations, including a county-wide map of all bus lines, to communicate patterns and support data-driven planning for transit operations.

title: Costco Financial Statement Analysis
description: Conducted in-depth financial and strategic analysis of Costco within the retail sector, evaluating market positioning, competitive landscape, and financial health. Performed SWOT analyses, calculated key financial ratios, and completed forecast and discounted cash flow valuations. Synthesized insights into formal reports and presentations, applying data-driven analysis to support strategic investment recommendations and strengthen analytical decision-making skills.

title: Personal Website
description: Designed and developed a personal website using HTML and CSS to showcase projects, skills, and experiences. Focused on creating a clean, responsive layout with intuitive navigation and interactive elements, building a professional online portfolio that highlights personal brand and technical capabilities.

title: LOZO Website Development and Feedback Analysis
description: Contributed to improving an educational web platform with an AI analyzer tool, enhancing report-saving efficiency by 50% for 100+ students and teachers across multiple schools. Conducted usability, feasibility, and utility testing, and developed a data-driven UX persona using Canva by analyzing behavioral data and interview feedback. Collaborated with the product manager to integrate insights into design updates, optimizing core features, improving website usability, and reducing task completion time through product analytics and data visualization.

title: Nvidia Balance Sheet Analysis
description: Conducted a detailed balance sheet analysis of NVIDIA, evaluating key financial metrics to assess liquidity, solvency, and overall financial health. Calculated and interpreted ratios such as current ratio, debt-to-equity, and return on equity to identify trends and insights. Synthesized findings into a clear report, providing data-driven recommendations and demonstrating strong analytical and financial modeling skills.

title: Meteorite Countries Landing Analysis
description: Analyzed global meteorite data to identify countries with the highest frequency of meteorite landings. Built predictive models to forecast meteorite occurrences and created visualizations to communicate trends and geographic patterns. Applied data analysis and visualization techniques to uncover insights, demonstrating skills in statistical modeling, geospatial analysis, and data-driven prediction.
